name: Additional powers
text: The powers conferred upon the corporation by this subpart shall be in addition and supplemental to the powers conferred upon it by any other law, and nothing in this subpart shall be construed as limiting any powers, rights, privileges, or immunities conferred upon it. [L 1998, c 212, pt of §4]  	    [Section effective July 1, 2006.  For section effective until June 30, 2006, see above.]  The powers conferred upon the administration by this subpart shall be in addition and supplemental to the powers conferred upon it by any other law, and nothing in this subpart shall be construed as limiting any powers, rights, privileges, or immunities conferred upon it. [L 1998, c 212, pt of §4; am L 2005, c 196, §26(a)]
